Description: Fragments of a 'kohl' tube of palm-column form: the body was light green, perhaps translucent with the usual chevron pattern in yellow on the lower shaft. Yellow threads encircle the upper shaft while the elements of the capital are outlined in white. Condition, very incomplete. The preserved elements include the palm capital, base of the shaft and a few scattered fragments. All surfaces are in bad condition.
Curator's comments: This vessel is of interest as one of the very rare New Kingdom vessels found in the Delta.
